major: Nutrition & Health Sciences: Nutrition Science Option

Nutrition Science.1: Demonstrate required knowledge and skills for pre-professional or graduate school.
Nutrition Science.2: Understand nutrient metabolism in health and disease.
Nutrition Science.3: Navigate and interpret research-based scientific literature.
Nutrition Science.4: Communicate nutrition science concepts to professional and lay audiences.
Nutrition Science.5: Apply the metabolic and social principles of nutrition to healthy living.
